_sText:
This is a linear tier 3 surf map; its a fairly fast made characterized by a lot of flat jumps and some blind jumps. It takes about 40 seconds to complete for a typical run. 

Here is a video (complete with traditional beat music):
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/uQ0ZSOeqwqQ?list=UUOPP5K8T-54uAGw1O-VqsjQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Give it a try, have fun, and tell me what you think.
